name: But I don't like guys! (Demo)
description:
Waylon("Lonnie" for short) is trying to figure out his feelings towards Jesse, a triceratops cutie. Today just happens to be Velocitines Day- the day of the year when you get a gift or two for that sexy special someone ;3 Luckily, Clint(a foxy femboy and Jesse's best friend) is willing to help you get some triceratops tailhole.

But I Don't Like Guys! is a romantic comedy point and click adventure coming soon...

Controls

Mouse: move cursor

Left click: interact with hotspots
